    Hello! This is Abraham, a Data Specialist working in the field of Public Health at Impact Initiatives in Geneva, Switzerland, started in November 2023. I moved couple of countries with Impact Initiatives (Lebanon, Jordan, and Ukraine) and worked on multiple complex humanitarian contexts (Syria, Ukraine, and currently covering a global position). I hold a BSc in Computer Science and currently pursuing my MSc in Geographical Information Systems at University of Aberdeene.

    Since then, I have been pursuing my passion for:

    • Data Science
    • Software Development
    • Remote Sensing & GIS
    • Programming Languages
